meta.title: Street News - Gangsta Duel Reports
meta.description: Catch the latest updates, underground news, and spotlight stories from the gritty world of Gangsta Duel.

pageSubtitle: Fresh updates and underground buzz from the world of Gangsta Duel

articles.title: New Arsenal Drop: 50 Fresh Weapons Unleashed!
articles.excerpt: The armory just got stacked! Unlock 50 new weapons with deadly combos, slick animations, and tactical advantages to dominate the streets.

articles.title: Legend Spotlight: Player Sets New Duel Record
articles.excerpt: Player 'G_DuelistX' crushed the leaderboard, winning 100 street fights in under 60 minutes! Watch the replays and check their elite tactics.

articles.title: Behind the Streets: Building the Gangsta Duel World
articles.excerpt: Go behind the scenes with our lead devs and discover how urban chaos meets game design. From alleyways to arsenals, hereâ€™s how we built the vibe.

articles.title: Mobile Turf Wars: Gangsta Duel Goes Portable
articles.excerpt: Get ready to brawl on the go. The mobile version of Gangsta Duel is almost here, optimized for touch controls and street-ready performance.

articles.title: Pro Moves: Mastering Duel Mechanics
articles.excerpt: Want to fight like the legends? This guide reveals advanced duel techniques, dodge-timing tips, and strategy layers that separate rookies from gangstas.

articles.title: Holiday Heat: Festive Fight Nights Are Live
articles.excerpt: Celebrate with street flair! Limited-time holiday challenges bring new styles, themed gear, and exclusive seasonal rewards to heat up your duel nights.
